Summary: BACARDI - Same transport mode is displayed for the multimodal Shipments multimodal shipment
Creator: Divagar Karunanidhi (DHL IT Services), external
Description:
h3. *Steps to Reproduce:*

1. Navigate to Business Process Automation-->Integration --> Integration Manager
2. Upload the XML file 'FB-AU-RJ-07 Order'.xml
3. Copy transmission No generated after XML upload
4. Go to Business Process Automation-->Integration --> Transmission Manager -- Give the copied Transmission No
5. Check the status Of the Transmission it should be in Process, open the transmission and Copy the Object ID without domain name.
6. Login with Planner/Super user and Navigate to Order Release Workbench and use replace option to search Order id.
7. Open the order in EDIT mode and Go to 'Constraints' tab, and enter the itinerary ID 'ITI-MULTILEG-20250613' in 'Buy Fixed Itinerary' field and click Finished.
8. Now, plan the order.
9. As a multi-leg setup, there should be 3 shipments created for a single order with below sequence:
10. Source Location to Port, Port To Port, Port To destination location

----

h3. *Data:*

Order release id: is TAAS_20251029160435

ShipmentID : 1000005601,1000005599,1000005600

----

h3. *Expected Result:*

Transport mode should be ROAD_FTL,OCEAN_FCL,ROAD_LTL

----

h3. *Actual Result:*

All 3 shipment has transport mode as OCEAN_FCL

----

h3. *XML and Screenshots:*

[^CreateOrderTemplate_Multileg_new_834.xml]

!image-20251029-105106.png|width=678,alt="image-20251029-105106.png"!

Summary: BACARDI - driver name and hbol values are not reflected after mass update
Creator: Sandeep Reyyi (DHL IT Services), external
Description:
Steps to reproduce ::


* *Login* to OTM as user *TaasOTMuser*.
* *Switch role* to *SUPER_USER_ROLE*.
* *Create integration XML* for order creation using the template *CreateOrderTemplate* (file: {{TL.xml}}).
** XML generated: {{TL_new_38.xml}}
** *Order Release ID:* {{TAAS_20251029162011}}
* *Upload* the XML through *Integration Manager → Upload Transmission*.
** Confirm transmission status: *STAGED → PROCESSED*.
* Go to *Order Management → Order Release Workbench*.
* Search for *Order Release ID = TAAS_20251029162011*.
** Verify that the order release is displayed successfully.
* *Plan shipment* using *Operational Planning → Create Buy Shipment → Bulk Plan - Buy* with the required planning parameter set.
** Bulk plan completed successfully.
** *Shipment ID:* {{1000005636}} generated.
* Navigate to *Shipment Workbench* and *search* for *Shipment ID = 1000005636*.
** Shipment record displayed successfully.
* *Tender* the shipment and confirm that it is *accepted*.
* *Switch OTM role* to *SUPER_USER_ROLE* again (after tender acceptance).
* Navigate to *Debrief Workbench*.
* *Search* for *Shipment ID = 1000005636*.
** Shipment retrieved successfully.
* Enter the following details under *Debrief Header*:
** *Driver Name*
** *HBOL*
** Save the changes.
* Go to *Actions → Print → Print Security Details*.
** *Expected Result:* The printed report should display the entered *Driver Name*  and *HBOL*  values.
** *Actual Result:* The *Driver Name* and *HBOL* values are *not reflected* in the *Print Security Details* output.

!image-20251029-103729.png|width=850,alt="image-20251029-103729.png"!



!image-20251029-103744.png|width=1114,alt="image-20251029-103744.png"!

Creator: Sandeep Reyyi (DHL IT Services), external
Description:
# *Login* to OTM as user *TaasOTMuser*.

#* Confirm transmission status changes from *STAGED → PROCESSED*.
# Navigate to *Order Release Workbench*.
# *Verify* the newly created *Order Release* is displayed ({{Order Release ID: TAAS_20251029153752}}).
# *Plan shipment* using *Operational Planning → Create Buy Shipment → Bulk Plan - Buy* with the required parameter set.
#* Confirm the *Bulk Plan* completes successfully ({{Status: COMPLETED}}, {{Bulk Plan ID: 20251029-0049}}).
#* Shipment is built successfully ({{Shipment ID: 1000005596}}).
# Navigate to *Shipment Dispatch Workbench* and *search* for the created shipment.
#* Verify the shipment record is displayed successfully.
# *Verify initial shipment values:*
#* *Total Gross Weight:* 2000.00 KG 
#* *Total Gross Volume:* 4.00 CUMTR 
#* *Total Ship Unit Count:* 2 
#* *Total Actual Cost:* 320 
# *Edit the Shipment* (as part of update validation).
# *Create shipment event XML* using the template *Order Release update - Actuals1.xml*.

* A new XML file is created, e.g., {{Order Release update - Actuals1_new_157.xml}}.

# *Upload* the update XML through *Integration Manager*.

* Confirm transmission status changes to *PROCESSED*.

# Navigate again to *Shipment Dispatch Workbench* and *search* for the same Shipment ID ({{1000005596}}).
# *Verify updated shipment field values:*

* *Total Gross Weight:* 1500.00 KG 
* *Total Gross Volume:* 6.00 CUMTR 
* *Total Ship Unit Count:* 3

10. Open the shipment in EDIT mode and check the refnum value of refnum qualifier FBA_PROCESS_MODE.
11. If its value is AUTOMATIC, Add CK-Cost OK event to the shipment, tender the shipment, accept the tender.

17. Check the status Of the Transmission it should be in Process, open the transmission and Copy the Object ID without domain name.
18. Switch to FBA Super User Role
19. Navigate to Automated Invoice Workbench and use replace option to search Invoice id.

Order release Id:TAAS_20251016160433

Expected: Invoice should to linked to shipment and planning status should be new

Summary: BACARDI - Invoice Matching rules are displayed as Invalid for few rules
Creator: Divagar Karunanidhi (DHL IT Services), external
Description:
Steps to reproduce ::

|# Login as Super user role
# Navigate to Business Process Automation-->Integration --> Integration Manager
# Upload the Release_Automatic.xml
# Copy transmission No generated after XML upload
# Go to Business Process Automation-->Integration --> Transmission Manager -- Give the copied Transmission No
# Check the status Of the Transmission it should be in Process, open the transmission and Copy the Object ID without domain name.
# Navigate to Order release Workbench and use replace option to search order release id.
# Plan the order release using bulk plan option.
# Once it is planned, take the shipment id.
\\
10. Navigate to Shipment Dispatch workbench and use replace option to search shipment id.
11. Check tender status of the shipment - it should be SECURE RESOURCES_TENDERED as rate is auto tender as yes
12. Go to action Shipment management -> tender -> accept tender option to accept it
13. Navigate to Business Process Automation-->Integration --> Transmission manager and move to transaction tab and provide shipment id in object field to search.
14. Add tracking event (Action-> Shipment Management -> Events -> Add shipment tracking event) -> select responsble party as Control Tower, status as X3-Arrived at Pick-up Location, type as X3-Arrived at Pick-up Location, Shipment stop as 1 and event date with current date and save it.
15. Add tracking event (Action-> Shipment Management -> Events -> Add shipment tracking event) -> select responsble party as Carrier, status as U1-Completed Unloading at Delivery Location, type as U1-Completed Unloading at Delivery Location, Shipment stop as Final stop and event date with current date and save it.
16. Add tracking event (Action-> Shipment Management -> Events -> Add shipment tracking event) -> select responsble party as Carrier, status as COST OK, type as COST OK, Shipment stop as 1 and event date with current date and save it.
17. Upload Automatic_Invoice_Standard.xml
18. Switch to FBA_SUPER_USER_ROLE
19. Navigate to Automatic Invoice Workbench
20. Search for Invoice and edit it.
21. *Edit screen should have Match Rules displaying all match rules whether it is valid or not valid*|

Shipment ID : 1000005140

Expected: All the matching rules should be valid

Actual : Few rules are matching(please the screen the attached screenshot)

    Then Verify "Disbursement Request Number" field value as assigned value "UpdatedBillID" for "Disbursement Bill"
    And Note down the "Disbursement Request Number" value as "NewBillID" in page name "Disbursement Bill" OTMCloud
    And Note down the "Disbursement Request Date" value as "NewBillDate" in page name "Disbursement Bill" OTMCloud
    Then Edit the Bill OTM Cloud
    Then Verify the Edited values in Bill Remarks

Summary: BACARDI - 1 invoice was created instead of 2 invoice
Creator: Sivamoorthy Arumugam (DHL IT Services)
Description:
Steps to reproduce ::

Dev URL - 
[https://otmgtm-test-dhlsctcoe.otmgtm.eu-frankfurt-1.ocs.oraclecloud.com/|https://otmgtm-dev1-dhlsctcoe.otmgtm.eu-frankfurt-1.ocs.oraclecloud.com/]

h3. *Steps to Reproduce:*

# Log in to OTM as user {{EUBacardiOTMuser}}.
# Create a new order using the template: {{CreateOrderTemplate_SAPTRFCL.xml}}.
# Plan the order via *Bulk Plan - Buy*.
# Debrief the shipment:
#* Perform *Secure Resource*
#* *Accept Tender*
#* Add tracking events in sequence:
#** {{VESSEL_DEPARTURE}}
#** {{X3-Arrived at Pick-up Location}}
#** {{CKP-Departed Origin Port Cost Ok}}
# Switch to role {{FBA_SUPER_USER_ROLE}}.
# Go to *Manual Invoice Workbench*, search for the shipment, and approve the generated invoice.
# Switch back to role {{SUPER_USER_ROLE}}.
# Edit the same shipment and:
#* Add new shipment cost under *Finance tab*
#* Re-log the *CKP-Departed Origin Port Cost Ok* event again
# Switch again to {{FBA_SUPER_USER_ROLE}}.
# Navigate to *Manual Invoice Workbench*, search by the same shipment ID.
# Verify the invoice count.

----

h3. *Expected Result:*

Two invoices should be generated when the *CKP-Departed Origin Port Cost Ok* event is logged twice after cost adjustment.

----

h3. *Actual Result:*

Only *one invoice* is found.

 

Shipment ID:- 1000002986

!image-20251016-130432.png|width=727,alt="image-20251016-130432.png"!

Summary: BACARDI -Record not exists in Shipment Track Event
Creator: Sivamoorthy Arumugam (DHL IT Services)
Description:
Steps to reproduce ::

[https://otmgtm-test-dhlsctcoe.otmgtm.eu-frankfurt-1.ocs.oraclecloud.com/|https://otmgtm-dev1-dhlsctcoe.otmgtm.eu-frankfurt-1.ocs.oraclecloud.com/]

# *Login to OTM* as user {{EUBacardiOTMuser}}.
# Switch to role: *SUPER_USER_ROLE*.
# Create an order using XML template: {{SAPTR.xml}}.
→ Order ID: {{TAAS_20250918133032}}
# Upload order through *Integration Manager*.
→ Transmission ID: {{2233606}}, Status: {{PROCESSED}}
# Navigate to *Order Release Workbench* and verify order is displayed.
# Plan shipment using *Bulk Plan - Buy*.
→ Shipment ID: {{1000002948}}
# Navigate to *Shipment Debrief Workbench* and search for the shipment.
# Verify *Tender Status* is {{SECURE RESOURCES_TENDERED}}.
# Accept the tender as *Planner OTMCloud*.
# Verify *Tender Status* is updated to {{SECURE RESOURCES_ACCEPTED}}.
# Switch to role: *TAAS_ROBOT*.
# Create shipment event using XML template: {{POST_GOODS_ISSUE_Updated.xml}}.
# Upload the XML via *Integration Manager*.
→ Transmission ID: {{2233624}}, Status: {{PROCESSED}}
# Switch to role: *PLANNER_ROLE*.
# Navigate to *Shipment Debrief Workbench* and search for the same shipment ({{1000002948}}).
# Try to verify if *shipment event is displayed* in the *Shipment Track Event split screen*.

----

h3. *Actual Outcome:*

* *No record* is displayed in the *Shipment Track Event* screen.



Expected Outcome:
